summary: Implements a ConvBERT-based model for assigning labels to input text sequences. It encapsulates a pretrained ConvBERT encoder and a classification head, handling token inputs, producing logits, and supporting fine‑tuning for downstream NLP classification tasks.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use neural network that can be trained or applied to text classification problems such as sentiment analysis, intent detection, or topic categorization, leveraging the efficiency of ConvBERT.
